name: Militaristic
friendBonusUniques: As friends, can provide a special [Land] unit for every 100 turns
allyBonusUniques: As allies, can provide a special [Land] unit for every 50 turns

name: Maritime
friendBonusUniques: As friend, can provide a [Civilian Ship] unit
Trade Routes will increase Influence by 10%
allyBonusUniques: As allies, can provide a [Water] unit
Trade Route will increase Influence by 25%

name: Religious
uniques: Can create, expand and spread a religious
friendBonusUniques: As friend, can provide a [Faith] unit and +10 Faith
allyBonusUniques: As allies, can provide a [Faith] unit and +25 Faith
Having the same Religion will increase Influence by 25%

name: Scientific
uniques: Can research the technology on its own
allyBonusUniques: As allies, can provide a [Science] unit and +25 Science
Sharing Technology will increase Influence by 25%

name: Mercantile
uniques: Can create Trade Routes on its own
allyBonusUniques: As allies, can provide a [Gold] unit and +25 Gold
Trade Routes will increase Influence by 30%

name: Type
uniques: Can create Trade Routes on its own
allyBonusUniques: As allies, can provide a [Gold] unit and +25 Gold
Trade Routes will increase Influence by 30%
